content: I am meeting with someone to help set up her Cookbook. She has some actions failing. We noticed that the radar cookbook uses PATs for the GitHub secrets but the others don't. Why is this?
@Max Grover can speak more here, but should just be specifically to access the ARM-housed data through their data toolkit
Were y'all able to diagnose/resolve the issues?
Yeah it was some permissions in her repository settings
She said she'll make a PR with some improvements to the Cookbook contributing guide. Which would be awesome.
